verses.verse: The fool <S%H5036><s%> has said <S%H559><s%> in his heart, <S%H3820><s%> "There is no God. <S%H430><s%>" They are corrupt, <S%H7843><s%> and have done abominable <S%H8581><s%> iniquity. <S%H5766><s%> There is no one who does <S%H6213><s%> good. <S%H2896><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> looks down <S%H8259><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%> on the children <S%H1121><s%> of men, <S%H120><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> if there are <S%H3426><s%> any who understood, <S%H7919><s%> who seek <S%H1875><s%> after God. <S%H430><s%>
Every one of them has gone back. <S%H5472><s%> They have become filthy <S%H444><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%> There is no one who does <S%H6213><s%> good, <S%H2896><s%> no, <S%H259><s%> not one.

Have the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%> no knowledge, <S%H3045><s%> who eat up <S%H398><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> as they eat <S%H398><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> and don't <S%H7121><s%> call on God? <S%H430><s%>

There they were in great <S%H6343><s%> fear, <S%H6342><s%> where no fear <S%H6343><s%> was, <S%H430><s%> for God has scattered <S%H6340><s%> the bones <S%H6106><s%> of him who encamps <S%H2583><s%> against you. <S%H954><s%> You have put them to shame, because God <S%H430><s%> has rejected them. <S%H3988><s%>

Oh that <S%H5414><s%> the salvation <S%H3444><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> would come out of Zion! <S%H6726><s%> When God <S%H430><s%> brings back <S%H7725><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> from captivity, <S%H7622><s%> then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> shall rejoice, <S%H1523><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall be glad. <S%H8055><s%>
